1.text: Here are the steps to make tea. Read and put them in order.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Here are the steps to make tea. Read and put them in order.</prosody></speak>

2.text: 1. Pour the boiled water into the teapot. □ 2. Add tea leaves and keep it for a few seconds. □ 3. Stir well. □ 4. Now strain it to a jug, and add sugar and milk to taste. □ 5. Now strain it into a cup. □ 6. Boil some water. □
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. Pour the boiled water into the teapot. 2. Add tea leaves and keep it for a few seconds. 3. Stir well. 4. Now strain it to a jug, and add sugar and milk to taste. 5. Now strain it into a cup. 6. Boil some water.</prosody></speak>

7.text: I am Poorni. My birthday falls in December. It's on Christmas day. Last year, on my 10th birthday my father and I went to Nicoli bookshop. It was a Wednesday. He bought me two books. They are Madol Duwa and Harry Potter.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>I am <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='puːrni'>Poorni</phoneme>. My birthday falls in December. It's on Christmas day. Last year, on my 10th birthday my father and I went to Nicoli bookshop. It was a Wednesday. He bought me two books. They are Madol Duwa and Harry Potter.</prosody></speak>

8.text: Find the words starting with a capital letter. Write them in your book.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Find the words starting with a capital letter. Write them in your book.</prosody></speak>
